name: PullRequest_Conflict
on:
  schedule:
  - cron: '0 23 * * 1-5'
  workflow_dispatch:
jobs:
  check-conflict:
    timeout-minutes: 2
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - uses: slackapi/slack-github-action@v1.16.0
      if: steps.conflict_pull_requests.outputs.value != ''
      with:
        payload: "{\"text\":\"${{ steps.conflict_pull_requests.outputs.value }}\"}"
      env:
        SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL: ${{ secrets.NOTIFICATION_PULLREQUEST_CONFLICT }}
